channel.title: PhotoShop Help :) :)
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm very very new to Photoshop. In fact; I only got it yesterday. I would really love it if some people could give me some ideas on where to start as I am completely confused about everything.
So, If anybody at all could give me little pointers on where to begin, I would love it :D
Reply here or:
MSN - B00mh3adsh0t@hotmail.co.uk AIM - BertyUser

item.title: PhotoShop Help :) :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

you could try websites...

www.good-tutorials.com
www.n-sane.net
www.planetphotoshop.com
www.tutorialized.com/tutorials/Photoshop/1

I use those a lot. And to begin.. just fool around with it a little. Try some brush strokes, choose different settings, get familiar with it and you'll be alright. Try going to Filter > Render > Clouds and then use other filters like wind or something just for fun.

~Ron

Read full topic
